About the Company: LAWRESHWAR POLYMERS LIMITED (LPL) was incorporated as a Private Limited Company in the year 1994 with the object of manufacturing of canvas shoes, lightweight hawai chappals & EVA Injection footwear. The status and name of the company was changed to public limited company Lawreshwar Polymers Limited w.e.f. 27.05.1996. The Company is promoted by Shri Raj Kumar Agarwal alongwith Shri Mohan Lal Agarwal and Shri Naresh Agarwal. T
